contents:
About Dr. Kondabolu Lakshmi Prasad Public School, Guntur Dr. Kondabolu Lakshmi Prasad Public School, also known as Dr. KLP Public School, was established in 1983. It is managed by the Nagarjuna Education Society and is affiliated with the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE).
School Information Year of Establishment 1983 School Area 12,485 Sq. Metres Parent Institution Nagarjuna Education Society Academics Affiliation: CBSE Streams Offered: PCM, PCB & Arts Medium(s) of Instruction: English Classes: Nursery to 12th Gender: Co-Ed Residential Status: Boarding School No. of Classrooms: 87 Type: Unaided / Independent Highest Education Level: Sr. Secondary / Higher Secondary School Year of Opening: 2005 PRIMARY TO SECONDARY The school follows the NCERT syllabus and curriculum from Grade I to XII. It also offers Artificial Intelligence as a subject for Classes IX & X.
SENIOR SECONDARY Stream Combination Additional Subject M.P.C Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, English Physical Education Bi.P.C Biology, Physics, Chemistry, Computer Science, English Physical Education M.Bi.P.C Mathematics, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, English Physical Education H.P.G History, Political Science, Geography, Computer Science, English Physical Education Total Fee for New Admissions The average fee for new admissions at Dr. Kondabolu Lakshmi Prasad Public School is ₹40,000/-.
Fee Breakdown Type Frequency Amount Tuition Fee Yearly ₹40,000 The fees provided above are to the best of our knowledge. This information might vary. Please get in touch with the school for proper details.
For more information, please visit the school’s official website.

title: DR KLP PUBLIC SCHOOL

contents:
Education:- Central Board of Secondary Education DR.KLP PUBLIC SCHOOL (2019) Overview:
I have completed Secondary School education under the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) curriculum, achieving a commendable percentage in the year 2019.
Senior Secondary Education (12th Grade) Narayana Junior College (2021) Overview:
I completed my Higher Secondary education (Intermediate) at Narayana Junior College, achieving a score of 74%.
Bachelor of Technology Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology (2021 - 2025) Overview:
Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) degree in Information Technology at Kallam Haranadhareddy Institute of Technology.
